short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that adds a tag to the LinkedIn profiles of Anti-Zionists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Since October 7th we’ve seen a spike in anti-Zionist propaganda across the internet, particularly social media. These hateful messages directly promote Antisemitism and fake news, and they’re harmful in many ways. 

The purpose of this extension is to create awareness around perpetrators of anti-Zionist sentiment on social media. Currently we’re operating only on LinkedIn.

The community adds problematic profiles to the database for approval by our team. New submissions are done via this form: –

Then, if you have the extension installed, you’ll be able to view a special tag on any anti-Zionist profiles on LinkedIn, and act accordingly (for example, if you wish not to do business with such people).

Disclaimer: We do not discriminate based on gender, race, religion or political views. Anti-Zionism is hate speech, and not specific to the political spectrum. 

If you'd like to report an Anti Zionist, you can do it using this form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdZJhVhYGb2IFih27WTaRdI4QfPNvsMi7XEsi1-haxf_WL-lw/viewform
